short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block comments on commits in Azure Devops and add syntax highlighting for vue single file components

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reviewing pull request by commit in Azure DevOps does not work nicely, because comments added to a commit do not show up on the overview page. This extension blocks the network call and gives you a notification when you try to add a comment on a commit, saving you the trouble of adding all those comments again on the file view. This also adds the missing syntax highlighting for Vue single file components in Azure Devops.
